answers.author: Edward Chew
answers.text:
Our City does not have any limitations in terms of mileage nor are there any costs to the employee. They are only allowed to drive the vehicle when away from work while they are on-call. Otherwise, they are to only drive to and from work (e.g. no personal use of the vehicle while not on call).

author: Matthew Powers
text:
I am seeking feed back on the policies from various police departments who allow their employees to take their assigned vehicles home.  

How does your agency / department measure distances (aerial or driven miles)
What is the maximum distance for your agency / department. 
Are their any cost to the employee to take their assigned vehcile home.
If so how is the cost accessed, flat fee, mileage fee, fuel fee, etc..
title: Take Home Police Department Vehicles
